title: How do big data companies ensure their data was obtained legally? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: What do you mean by “big data companies”? Do you mean companies that provide big data products/software/services? If so they don’t have “big data”, their customers do and they keep it to themselves. Do you mean companies that use big data products/software/services? If so they obtain the data from their own products, software, or devices. They will have their own policies about data collection.
